TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_laluma'an_nu_Laniste, title = laluma'an_nu_Laniste, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/laluma'an_nu_Laniste} }

S.FORM: laluma'an nu Laniste i Ba'ba'tuwan nu Casteli (Amilika: House Lannister of Casterly Rock) u nisangaan i lalabu nu dadiw nu sulda atu lamal nu misulitay ci George Raymond Richard Martin, u caay katenga a laluma'an. kamu nu heni, u " tengilen tu ku nipiuyuy nu maku." u bayabay nu heni sa, u sumanahay a lala' atu macelahay a lukedaw. laylay atu micidakay u macelahay a bukes ku heni. i kalingatuwan nu laluma'an nu Laniste hananay sa, u talacawaan nu misatahaway nu Antalay a tademaw atu wawana nu mukeliday i Baba'tuwan nanutawya. nika, u idang (izang) nu mukeliday hananay sa, namakay cacayay a pacebaay i sibutulay a kungku hananay, ci Lann ku sitangahay. izaw (idaw) ku cacay a kungku nu nida (niza) hananay, madayum cinida, makaala tu Ba'tuba'tuwan nu laluma'an nu Kayste hananay. u kasahenulay a tademaw nu laluma'an nu Laniste Selsi Laniste Ceymi Laniste Tiliyung Laniste Taywen Laniste Misela Laniste (Amilika a kamu: Myrcella Baratheon) u pucud ni Selsi Laniste aci Ceymi Laniste. == malalitin tu ihekaay atu zumaay a natinengan ==

laloma'an no Laniste i Ba'ba'towan no Casteli (Amilika: Hoose Lannister of Casterly Rock) o nisangaan i lalabo no dadiw no solda ato lamal no misolitay ci George Raymond Richard Martin, o caay katenga a laloma'an. kamo no heni, o " tengilen to ko nipioyoy no mako." o bayabay no heni sa, o somanahay a lala' ato macelahay a lokedaw. laylay ato micidakay o macelahay a bokes ko heni. i kalingatowan no laloma'an no Laniste hananay sa, o talacawaan no misatahaway no Antalay a tademaw ato wawana no mokeliday i Baba'towan nanotawya. nika, o idang (izang) no mokeliday hananay sa, namakay cacayay a pacebaay i sibotolay a kongko hananay, ci Lann ko sitangahay. izaw (idaw) ko cacay a kongko no nida (niza) hananay, madayom cinida, makaala to Ba'toba'towan no laloma'an no Kayste hananay. o kasahenolay a tademaw no laloma'an no Laniste Selsi Laniste Ceymi Laniste Tiliyong Laniste Taywen Laniste Misela Laniste (Amilika a kamo: Myrcella Baratheon) o pocod ni Selsi Laniste aci Ceymi Laniste. == malalitin to ihekaay ato zomaay a natinengan ==
